content: this pattern is wire free and child friendly especially if facial features including eyes are embroidered the material list is small consisting of red heart comfort yarn in silver approx one skein and a small amount of black 3mm crochet hook i used safety eyes and fiberfill this pattern can be made larger as required by changing the hook and/or yarn size this pattern was created for a friend in one of my facebook groups in memory of her beautiful cat wally i hope you enjoy making elon and should you come across any errors please don t hesitate to let me know so that they can be corrected **please note corrections ** **on back feet 5b where it starts with single_crochet chain 1 turn - please omit as it was a dyslexic burp when i was typing **another explanation on sewing front legs you must sew 17 of the leg stitches to the 17 stitches of the body that you marked off 1 leg on each side of the ending spot of round 20 then sew 4 of the center leg stitches together this leaves 7 unused stitches on each leg & 44 stitches on the body round 21 starts in the 1st stitch after where you attached the leg
